inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run. Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: includePath
inputs.label: NLU.DevOps custom NLU provider include path.

inputs.name: nupkgPath
inputs.label: Path containing .nupkg to use for installing dotnet-nlu
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path containing .nupkg to use for installing dotnet-nlu.

inputs.name: toolPath
inputs.label: .NET Core tool path to install dotnet-nlu.
inputs.helpMarkDown: .NET Core tool path to install dotnet-nlu.
